Method Detail

applyColorBlending

public static Image applyColorBlending(Image source,
                                       int color,
                                       int coeff)
Apply colorblending to source-image and return the blended image.

Parameters:
source - the image that will be blended
color - the color that is used for blending
coeff - the amount of transparency (0-255) for the color
Returns:
blended image
